title: Monsters & Souls
text:
These models spawn onto the battlefield using their corresponding spawning pits. Your hope should be to encounter more Souls than Monsters - the Souls are what will earn you a victory in Mideon.

'If a fight is what y' want, then bring it, beast! You might 'o had yer fun wit' som' o' tha' others tha' came 'ere - but y' never faced one o' the likes a' me!!'

- Brok , Dwarf Berserker.
